name: azure-applicationinsights-query
author: Microsoft Corporation
description: ApplicationInsightsDataClient Library with typescript type definitions and works in node.js and browser javascript.

scripts.build: npm -s run-script tsc && webpack && node node_modules/uglify-es/bin/uglifyjs --source-map -c -m -o applicationInsightsDataClientBundle.min.js applicationInsightsDataClientBundle.js
